name: Arcane Wasteland
description:
The year is 2042. The world's apocalypse came but not the way anyone imagined, in 2030 a majority of the world's population acquired the power to wield different magical elements, things such as Fire, Earth, Ice, Acid and many more.. With great power comes great responsibility and people were not responsible, they waged wars and civilization could not contain the great powers.. Now the world is in ruins. Those not gifted were weak but they gathered together and found out that they could use the bodies of those magically gifted to imbue their weapons with their power.

Press E and Q to switch between weapons.

Flamethrower uses the fire element.

The Ice Rifle is a sniper rifle using the ice element.

The Earthgun is a shotgun using the earth element.

The Rocket Launcher uses nuclear waste for an acid aftertaste.
